definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: If works voluntary worker, the life crosses looks like the slave.
sentences.chinese: 若工作成義工的話，一生過得像奴隸。

sentences.english: Our member, Lau Lim Yan was sharing her experience in being our volunteer.
sentences.chinese: 會員劉念恩分享了她當綠色和平義工的經歷。

sentences.english: The Volunteer Centre reserves the right to cancel or postpone any recreational courses.
sentences.chinese: 義工中心有權延遟或取消任何課程。

sentences.english: And she might do some volunteering.
Timberland organizes community-service projects around the world Last year, volunteers painted classrooms at a school in China.
sentences.chinese: 去年，在中國的志願義工爲學校粉刷教室。

sentences.english: Housing Society volunteers refurbish the homes for the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 房協的義工爲長者粉飾家居。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chan paints Jim in glowing colors as he's a devoted voluntary worker.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆是個很投入工作的義工，陳太太對他評價相當高。

sentences.english: There is relatively strong nominal wage stickiness in China's labor market.
sentences.chinese: 中國勞動力市場存在較強的名義工資粘性。

sentences.english: What are the activities or course that you would like us to organize for our volunteers?
sentences.chinese: 您希望慈光爲義工們舉辦那些活動或課程？

sentences.english: They know that she works as a volunteer at Saint Michael's Community Hospital on Fridays.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道她每星期五在聖邁克爾社區醫院做義工。

sentences.english: Also I can speak and wirte English. So I want to be a volunteer here to construct Harmonica University better.
sentences.chinese: 希望可以做草堂的義工，把草堂建設得更好。

sentences.english: Once in a while, they hear them just in time. I met Connie the day she was admitted to the hospice ward…
sentences.chinese: 我在康妮住進病房的那天見到了她，我在那兒當義工。

sentences.english: San Mateo County Library has many volunteer opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 聖馬刁縣立圖書館有許多地方歡迎義工協助。

sentences.english: What is the cost of staying at CTTB as a volunteer?
sentences.chinese: 萬佛聖城義工的住宿費用？

sentences.english: I love Beijing_Yigonglian, because here is my home.
sentences.chinese: 我愛北京義工聯，因爲這裏是我的家。

sentences.english: HEP arranged a Yakult manufactory visiting for volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 本會爲各義工舉辦了參觀益力多廠。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to show concern and care for
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
